data.title: Evolution of Post Massive Weight Loss Surgery
data.meta_description: Massive weight loss following bariatric surgery has led to the evolution of a new field: postbariatric body contouring. This chapter discusses body contouring surgery after massive weight loss narrated through the five most cited landmark papers in the literature....
